translations: 打鼾；鼾声；正在打呼噜（snore的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: Snoring can be more than an annoyance.
sentences.translation: 打呼噜不只是一桩烦人的事。

sentences.sentence: He was snoring when José awakened him.
sentences.translation: 侯赛叫醒他的时候他还在打呼噜。

sentences.sentence: I could hear Paul snoring in the next room.
sentences.translation: 我听得见保罗在隔壁房间里打呼噜。
